content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to current statistics or current team reviews. However, here are some of the top defensemen in Buffalo Sabres history:

1. Phil Housley- During his time with the Sabres, Housley recorded the most points ever by a defenseman in a single season. He is also one of the best puck-moving defensemen in NHL history.

2. Jim Schoenfeld- During his 13-year career with the Sabres, Schoenfeld was known for his physical play and his ability to shut down opposing teams' top players.

3. Mike Ramsey- Ramsey played 14 seasons with the Sabres and was a key part of the team's defensive core during the 1980s.

4. Alexei Zhitnik- Zhitnik was a solid two-way defenseman who played five seasons with the Sabres during the late 1990s and early 2000s.

5. Teppo Numminen- Numminen was a dependable defenseman who played for the Sabres for six seasons in the mid-2000s. He was also a mentor to several of the team's younger players at the time.
